item.title: What Internet Fandoms and Communities Can Tell Us About 2025
item.description: Fashion, stan, and other online spaces offer clues to what will dominate next year in politics—for better or, in some cases, much worse.

item.title: 13 Habits of Highly Effective Risk-Takers
item.description: From poker players to venture capitalists, there’s a mindset to making the most of opportunities, and engineering the odds of success.
